lead_paragraph: HARTH--Dr. Erich, died June 27 in Syracuse. After fleeing Austria in 1938, he ultimately settled in Syracuse, where he received his PhD and had a successful career as a professor in the Department of Physics. He was renowned for his research in Neuroscience. He also authored three books on the brain, and consciousness. His wife Dorothy died in 2015. He is survived by his sons Peter (Julie), and Richard; and grandson Adam. www.siss kindfuneralservice.com. 1/3
